channel.title: Scamming
channel.description:
So much fricken scamming on Runescape be careful, shit like this is fake
[URL=http://swiftkit.net][IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/1230/110212233629.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:95, topic:382305”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=478105.msg3515153#msg3515153 date=1298924142]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=478105.msg3515147#msg3515147 date=1298923960]

btw dice game 55x2 90x3 (if you lose on more than 100k, you get 50% back’)

That’s really quite generous of you!

Ikr, makes me wanna bet like 5m. If you lose, you have 2.5m, and can turn that into 5m again.
[/quote]And if you lose again, you’re down 5m

But statistically, you will gain if you play x amount of times.
[/quote]That’s considering you play with someone that is completely legit (win a large amount and they wont log)[/quote]

I’ve found like 2 or 3 legit guys in my time. The others just log out with 30k when i win their
“3x” jackpot. Stupid assholes. Wish I could be a hidden mod so my reports would get sent instantly and I could mute them until further notice.

Read full topic

But statistically, you will gain if you play x amount of times.[/quote]That’s considering you play with someone that is completely legit (win a large amount and they wont log)

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

i had alot of oppertunity to scam low lvls but felt sorry for them and didn’t.
then the dice game this lvl 50 lost 300k to me, he was winning with small bets, and i returned half of his.

btw dice game 55x2 90x3 (if you lose on more than 100k, you get 50% back’)

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:88, topic:382305”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=478105.msg3510583#msg3510583 date=1298517765]

If anyone believes doubling money or follow for money is real, then they deserve to be scammed.

There was an idiot who didn’t know how to scam with doubles, so he kept offering the double in the same trade. Made a good 80k off of him, then felt a bit bad and teled away.

Sometimes they’re not out to scam though
[/quote]
He was a level 5. And he wouldn’t do my larger offers of 100k+.[/quote]
But skillers have a lot of money

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

When I joined RS it was “go and grab that Zamorak wine I’ll pay you 500k but my magic level is too low” and then you just close the door every time they open it.

Good money.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Moparisthebest:

People have to have some common sense. Back when I played runescape everyone was ‘trimming armor for free!’ and of course the follow me to wilderness and I’ll give you money. No one fell for it, and if you did, you only fell for it once. But if you fall for something that stupid, it’s 100% your fault.

back when i joined rs in 06 people were smart now theres annoying 5 year olds

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:72, topic:382305”]Updates:
I logged in today to find my account has been logged into, with nothing changed except the account position and private chat status (which was turned off). I probably wouldn’t have noticed if it wasn’t for the “last IP logged in” feature…
How the hell do they keep getting my password? I just cleaned out my computer![/quote]
Have you read the topic in my signature?

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:76, topic:382305”]I’ve deleted the last two posts, which were an offer to sell an account and an offer to buy one. We don’t allow buying/selling of anything here for one precise reason:

SCAMMERS![/quote]
And because then Jagex can sue you for infringing on their copyrighted property!!1!!one!!

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I usually make my money off of doublers.
They try and lure you by doing small amounts, like 10-20k.
Just do that once and then say “Kthx” or something and just walk off.

Read full topic
